channel.title: Port changed?
channel.description: when i started me server is said starting killermanscape on 0.0.0.0:43594 then when i restarted it it changed to 10102 wtf happend?

yea,you have in a way i didnt know how to change ports what im trying to do it get it back up on 43594

Read full topic

item.title: Port changed?
item.dc:creator: @golddealer golddealer
item.description:
@golddealer wrote:

You must start your server, and then you get the numbers. Then you must open moparscape 3.2 and wait till it fully loaded. Then you type a name and a pass. And then you type the server IP, its 0.0.0.0 (Nothing else, just this) then you must press on: File >> New Port (right above) then you type the 5 numbers or 4 or whatever, just the numbers after the ‘’:’’ then you click Ok, and you login. If you want to change these settings, and want somebody in. You change the port and the IP. Y

You click on: New server (you type your no-ip, or your hamachi or your whatever numbers or digits) and you click on: New port (The port that others must set, if they want to get into your server, you choose just 5 numbers and click OK)

Now you’re ready, and you can enjoy your server with others and with yourself

(Im dutch, so sorry for the bad english)

Hope i helped you!

Read full topic
